text: The San Diego Film Critics Society Award for Best Animated Feature is an annual film award given by the San Diego Film Critics Society. ==Winners== ===2000s=== {| class="wikitable" width="95%" cellpadding="5" |- !width="100"|Year !width="300"|Film !width="300"|Director(s) !width="450"|Nominees |- | align="center"|2003 || The Triplets of Belleville (Les triplettes de Belleville) || Sylvain Chomet |style="font-size:smaller"| *Finding Nemo || Andrew Stanton *Sinbad: Legend of the Seven Seas || Tim Johnson Patrick Gilmore |- | align="center"|2004 || The Incredibles || Brad Bird |style="font-size:smaller"| *Shark Tale || Vicky Jenson *Shrek 2 || Andrew Adamson |- | align="center"|2005 || Howl's Moving Castle (Hauru no ugoku shiro) || Hayao Miyazaki |style="font-size:smaller"| *Corpse Bride || Tim Burton, Mike Johnson *Wallace & Gromit: The Curse of the Were- Rabbit || Nick Park, Steve Box |- | align="center"|2006 || Cars || John Lasseter and Joe Ranft |style="font-size:smaller"| *The Ant Bully || John A. Davis *Flushed Away || David Bowers Sam Fell *Happy Feet || George Miller *Monster House || Gil Kenan |- | align="center"|2007 || Ratatouille || Brad Bird |style="font-size:smaller"| *Bee Movie || Steve Hickner, Simon J. Smith *Persepolis || Marjane Satrapi, Vincent Paronnaud *The Simpsons Movie || David Silverman *Surf's Up || Ash Brannon, Chris Buck |- | align="center"|2008 || WALL-E || Andrew Stanton |style="font-size:smaller"| *Bolt || Chris Williams, Byron Howard *Kung Fu Panda || John Wayne Stevenson, Mark Osborne |- | align="center"|2009 || Up || Pete Docter |style="font-size:smaller"| *Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs || Phil Lord and Christopher Miller *Coraline || Henry Selick *Fantastic Mr. Fox || Wes Anderson *The Princess and the Frog || Ron Clements, John Musker |- |} ===2010s=== {| class="wikitable" width="95%" cellpadding="5" |- !width="100"|Year !width="300"|Film !width="300"|Director(s) !width="450"|Nominees |- | align="center"|2010 || Toy Story 3 || Lee Unkrich |style="font-size:smaller"| *Despicable Me || Pierre Coffin, Chris Renaud *How To Train Your Dragon || Chris Sanders, Dean DeBlois *The IllusionistL'Illusionniste|| Sylvain Chomet *Tangled || Nathan Greno Byron Howard |- | align="center"|2011 || Arthur Christmas || Sarah Smith |style="font-size:smaller"| *Kung Fu Panda 2 || Jennifer Yuh Nelson *Puss in Boots || Chris Miller *Rango || Gore Verbinski *Rio || Carlos Saldanha |- | align="center"|2012 || ParaNorman || Sam Fell and Chris Butler |style="font- size:smaller"| *Brave || |Mark Andrews, Brenda Chapman *Frankenweenie || Tim Burton *Hotel Transylvania || Genndy Tartakovsky *Wreck-It Ralph || Rich Moore |- | align="center"|2013 || The Wind Rises || Hayao Miyazaki |style="font- size:smaller"| *Get a Horse! || Lauren MacMullan *Despicable Me 2 || Pierre Coffin, Chris Renaud *Frozen || Chris Buck, Jennifer Lee *Monsters University || Dan Scanlon |- | align="center"|2014 || The Boxtrolls || Graham Annable and Anthony Stacchi |style="font-size:smaller"| *Big Hero 6 || Don Hall, Chris Williams *The Boy and the WorldO Menino e o Mundo || Ale Abreu *How to Train Your Dragon 2 || Dean DeBlois *The Lego Movie || Phil Lord, Chris Miller |- | align="center"|2015 || Anomalisa || Charlie Kaufman and Duke Johnson |style="font-size:smaller"| *The Good Dinosaur || Peter Sohn *Hotel Transylvania 2 || Genndy Tartakovsky *Inside Out || Pete Docter, Ronnie del Carmen *Shaun the Sheep Movie || Richard Starzak, Mark Burton |- | align="center"|2016 || Kubo and the Two Strings || Travis Knight |style="font- size:smaller"| *April and the Extraordinary WorldAvril et le Monde Truqué || Christian Desmares, Franck Ekinci *Long Way NorthTout en haut du monde || Rémi Chayé *Moana || Ron Clements, John Musker *Zootopia || Byron Howard, Rich Moore |- | align="center"|2017 || My Life as a Zucchini || Claude Barras |style="font-size:smaller"| *The Boss Baby || Tom McGrath *Coco || Lee Unkrich *Loving Vincent || Dorota Kobiela, Hugh Welchman *My Entire High School Sinking Into the Sea || Dash Shaw |- | align="center"|2018 || Isle of Dogs || Wes Anderson |style="font-size:smaller"| *Have a Nice Day || Liu Jian *Incredibles 2 || Brad Bird *Ralph Breaks the Internet || Rich Moore & Phil Johnston *Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse || Bob Persichetti, Peter Ramsey and Rodney Rothman |- | align="center"|2019 || I Lost My Body || Jérémy Clapin |style="font-size:smaller"| *Abominable || Jill Culton *How to Train Your Dragon: The Hidden World || Dean DeBlois *Missing Link || Chris Butler *Toy Story 4 || Josh Cooley |} ==References== *San Diego Film Critics Society - Awards * Category:Awards for best animated feature film
title: San Diego Film Critics Society Award for Best Animated Film
